subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: The women’s draw was hit with upsets as No. 3 Simona Halep and No. 12 Eugenie Bouchard, a finalist at Wimbledon last year, were defeated by opponents ranked outside the top 100.
snippet: The women’s draw was hit with upsets as No. 3 Simona Halep and No. 12 Eugenie Bouchard, a finalist at Wimbledon last year, were defeated by opponents ranked outside the top 100.
